page.title: 12Ditchling's Local News Media
page.content: The Ditchling Dialogue is a lively monthly magazine containing news of local activities.This magazine started in neighbouring Hassocks but a long time resident and lover of Ditchling sponsored the extension of circulation to Ditchling and has arranged a distribution plan which ensures that at least 95% of the homes in Ditchling get the publication each month. The objective was to provide a platform for local opinion and items of local interest including past history.The magazine is distributed on a 'give_ away' basis and is paid for by a multitude of local advertisements. There is a parish magazine called Ditchling Beacon which gives parochial news.There are two local weekly newspapers,The Mid Sussex Times and the Sussex Express.The first of these at one time had a local correspondent.
